oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A density theorem for weighted Fekete sets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ameur, Yacin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Complex Variables
Mathematical Physics
31C20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove a result concerning the spreading of weighted Fekete points in the plane.
Comment: Version 2 contains a number of clarifications, notably Lemma 2.8 (new), Lemma 2.10 (clarified), and the passage from eq. (4.3) to (4.4) (clarified)
